General.Name: Tamtron Group Oyj
General.Description: Tamtron Group Oyj provides advanced weighing solutions in Finland. It provides crane, on-board crane, on-board, and railway and truck scales; and load cells and OPU overload protection units. It also provides cloud services, consulting, installation, repair and maintenance, spare parts, and verification services. The company serves various industries, such as earth moving, forestry, logistics, ports, process and manufacturing, recycling and energy, and tailored solutions. It also exports its products to approximately 50 countries through partner network. The company was founded in 1972 and is based in Tampere, Finland.
